args: Is this article primarily about a new action or announcement by the Trump administration/White House/Executive? Respond simply with "yes" or "no" . Trump’s first orders likely to include border, drilling, DEI policies President-elect Donald Trump said Sunday night that he will sign “dozens of executive orders” within hours of taking office Monday, in an attempt to render many actions taken by the Biden administration over the past four years “null and void.” Stephen Miller, Trump’s incoming White House deputy chief of staff for policy, briefed congressional Republican leaders on the broad contours of what Trump is expected to sign, including sweeping changes related to the southern border, energy and the federal government workforce, said two people familiar with that call, who spoke on the condition of anonymity because the information had not been announced publicly.
